name: Orbimesh Weather Agent
description: Provides comprehensive global weather data using the Open-Meteo API. Fetches real-time conditions and forecasts for any location.

endpoints.description: Get current weather conditions for a location. Returns temperature, weather code, wind speed. Use for 'What is the weather in Hyderabad?', 'Current temperature in New York'.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude (e.g., 17.3850 for Hyderabad, 40.7128 for New York).

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude (e.g., 78.4867 for Hyderabad, -74.0060 for New York).

parameters.name: current
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of current weather variables.

endpoints.description: Get daily weather forecast for up to 16 days. Returns max/min temperatures, precipitation. Use for 'Weather forecast for next week', '7-day forecast for London'.

parameters.name: daily
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of daily forecast variables.
